message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product for $11,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a very competitive price.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $9,800. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and I'm excited about the potential benefits of this product.
I appreciate your offer, Bob. However, the value of this product to you is significant, and I believe my initial offer was fair. I'm willing to come down slightly to $10,500.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'm making a counteroffer of $10,250. I believe this is a fair price for the product, and I'm eager to move forward.
